Class OpStep

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.comm.OpStep
Direct Known Subclasses:
OpDeviceReq, OpDeviceRequest, OpHeartbeat, OpListenKeyboard, OpMoveCamera, OpNatch, OpPreset, OpPTZCamera, OpQuerySamples, OpRecallPreset, OpStatus, OpStoreMultiple, OpStorePreset, OpStoreProps
public abstract class OpStep extends Object
A step is one part of an operation to communicate with a field controller.
Author:
Douglas Lau
